text: Ranua is a municipality in Finland. As of 2013, almost 4,200 people lived there. Neighbouring municipalities are Ii, Simo, Tervola, Rovaniemi, Posio and Pudasjärvi. As of January 2014, there were almost 4,150 people living in Ranua. ==Lakes== Simojärvi, Näskäjärvi, Penämönjärvi, Impiönjärvi and Ranuanjärvi. There is also many smaller lakes in the area. ==References== ==Other websites== * Community website Category:Municipalities of Lapland (Finland) Category:1917 establishments in Europe Category:1910s establishments in Finland
title: Ranua
